title: Architecte Logiciel FullStack
summary: Senior level developer architect with extensive experience building secure applications using a wide range of technologies.
Specializes in modern Web UI, API, and Database development.
Experience working in Telecom and in the Financial/FinTech industries.
With a strong background in Java, NodeJS, DevOps, and Agile methodologies, I can bring a strong skillset to any development team with the ability to hit the ground running.
